sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"欣赏"之意。
means: appreciate ：多用于文学方面，强调对事物有深入的理解能力，且能鉴赏。
enjoy ：普通用词，使用广泛，程度不及appreciate,多指从外界事物中得到喜悦与满足，领略到乐趣，享受意味强。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"理解"之意。
means: understand ： 指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
comprehend ： 较正式用词，指对较复杂的事物能透彻理解其意义。
appreciate ： 语气较弱，指对某事物或意义有充分的理解。着重有能力领悟或觉察。
apprehend ： 指知道某事物或某观念的大概意义，但未能理解其内涵意义，暗含一知半解意味。
grasp ： 从本义抓紧、抓住，引申作"理解、掌握"。

sentence.Network_en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentence.Network_en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

sentence.Network_en: I do very much appreciate the quietness and privacy here.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的确非常喜欢这里宁静幽雅、不受打扰的氛围。

知_百度百科 ... 10. 识别;区别[ distinguish] 12. 赏识[ appreciate] 14. 要好[ be close friends].

list.abs: 金融词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Appeals panel 上诉委员会 Appreciation [财产] 增值；涨价 Appropriation 拨款；经费；指拨金额.

新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... apposite ? adj. 适当的，恰切的 appreciable ? adj. 可感知的,可评估的 apprehension ? n. 忧惧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from late Latin appretiat- 'set at a price, appraised', from the verb appretiare, from ad- 'to' + pretium 'price'

entry.def: If you appreciate something, for example a piece of music or good food, you like it because you recognize its good qualities.

example.tran: 任何人都能欣赏我们的音乐。

example.ex: In time you'll appreciate the beauty and subtlety of this language.
example.tran: 总有一天你会体会到这门语言的优美和微妙之处。

entry.def: If you appreciate a situation or problem, you understand it and know what it involves.

example.ex: She never really appreciated the depth and bitterness of the Irish conflict...
example.tran: 她从来没有真正认识到爱尔兰矛盾的深刻和激烈。

example.ex: He appreciates that co-operation with the media is part of his professional duties.
example.tran: 他懂得与媒体合作是自己工作职责的一部分。

entry.def: If you appreciate something that someone has done for you or is going to do for you, you are grateful for it.

example.ex: Peter stood by me when I most needed it. I'll always appreciate that...
example.tran: 当我最需要的时候，彼得在我身边支持我。我将永存感激。

entry.def: If something that you own appreciates over a period of time, its value increases.

example.ex: They don't have any confidence that houses will appreciate in value.
example.tran: 他们完全不相信房子会升值。

means.word_mean: 1. recognize with gratitude; be grateful for
2. be fully aware of; realize fully;

sentences.sentence: "Do you appreciate the full meaning of this letter?"
"The Germans want to appreciate the Deutsche Mark"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+preci价值,估价+able能……的→adj.可估价的;可察觉的
depreciate[v.贬低,贬值]+ion表名词→n.折旧,价值下降
ap一再+preci价值+ate表动词→一再给价→欣赏
de去掉+preci价值,估价+ate表动词→去掉价值→贬值

Sentence.sentence: The elderly appreciated the care and attention they received.
Dawson, I really appreciate what you've been through today.
We write to preserve our family histories so our children and grandchildren can learn and appreciate their heritage (传统)
He cannot appreciate the Picasso exhibition
He appreciates the woman's help with the band.
Many people do not appreciate modern art.

means.word_mean: 感激, 感谢； 为…表示感激(或感谢)

sentences.en: I appreciate your help very much.

means.word_mean: 欣赏, 赏识, 重视, 鉴赏

sentences.en: You can't appreciate English poetry unless you understand its rhythm.
sentences.cn: 你若不懂英文诗韵律, 就无法欣赏英文诗。

means.word_mean: (充分)意识到，觉察，察知，注意到；懂得，体会，领会，理解

sentences.en: I really appreciate the danger of this job.
sentences.cn: 我真的认识到了这份工作的危险。

means.word_mean: 对…作(正确)评价；鉴别；估计，估量
[美国英语]使增值，提高…的价值(或价格)(depreciate之对)

sentences.en: Things appreciate as time goes on.

sentences.cn: 新建筑通常会提高土地的价值。

means.word_mean: [美国英语]提高价值(或价格)，提价，涨价，增值；增多

sentences.cn: 财产价值每年都在增大。

jushi.english: Apples appreciated 2 to 3 dollars per box.
jushi.chinese: 苹果每箱价格提高二至三美元。

jushi.english: Things appreciate as time goes on.
The land has appreciated greatly since the new railway was built.
jushi.chinese: 自新铁路建成后,这片地的价值大为增加。
